summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VTC JABA DRIVER price calculation features. All backend APIs (19/19 tests passed) and frontend functionality working correctly. Real-time price calculation, minimum pricing, admin dashboard statistics, and CSV export all functioning as expected.

design_issues.issue: Minor React hydration warnings in console for select/option elements
design_issues.impact: No functional impact, cosmetic console warnings only

passed_tests: Reservation creation with pricing data (distance_km, duration_min, estimated_price)
Price calculation validation - Normal price test (31.1km, 44min = 69€)
Price calculation validation - Minimum price test (2km, 5min = 10€)
Get all reservations with pricing data
Get single reservation with pricing fields
CSV export with new pricing columns (Distance, Durée, Prix estimé)
Frontend booking form with real-time price calculation
Price estimation display (63€ for Gare du Nord → CDG, 28.4km, 40min)
Booking submission and confirmation page with price display
Admin dashboard statistics (15 total, 211€ CA Estimé)
Admin dashboard price badges and distance/duration columns
Admin dashboard search and filtering functionality
